name: synaesthesia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition in which someone experiences things through their senses in an unusual way, for example by experiencing a colour as a sound, or a number as a position in space: A person with synaesthesia may see, for example, the number 2 as a green number and the number 5 as a red number.
